section.title: Acknowledgments
section.t: Those who provided miscellaneous comments to early drafts of this document include: Matt W. Benjamin, Adam Emerson, Tom Haynes, J. Bruce Fields, and Lev Solomonov.
Idan Kedar caught a nasty bug in the interaction of client side mirroring and the minor versioning of devices.
